page.title: 12ATTITUDES IN KENDAL
page.content: This block is part of the old county of{Westmorland}which still exists in people's minds, if not on the map. The area continues to show{stability,}if not great riches, and its hardy citizens survive depressions both in weather and{employment}with typical Northern disregard for circumstances and events outside their immediate compass. Kendalians are, however, no longer either as isolated or self- sufficient as previously, since the {motorway}brings both tourists and vandals from the cities and the{Common {Market}brings both development grants and farming restrictions.{The average {Kendalian}has a strong sense of how to live well even though{religious commi- {tment}has waned with the rise of other entertainments and activities. A small survey showed that less than a 1/4 of young people feel any Christian faith.
